name: inter-ui
description: Font files for the Inter font family.
author: Rasmus Andersson (https://rsms.me)

scripts.build-supersets: npm run delete-supersets && npm run copy-supersets
scripts.delete-supersets: rm -fr './Inter (web)' && mkdir './Inter (web)' && rm -fr './Inter (web hinted)' && mkdir './Inter (web hinted)'
scripts.copy-supersets: cp -a './temp/Inter Hinted for Windows/Web/'*.woff* './Inter (web hinted)/' && cp -a './temp/Inter Web/'*.woff* './Inter (web)/'
scripts.build-subsets: npm run delete-subsets && npm run subset-hinted && npm run subset-unhinted && npm run subset-cleanup
scripts.delete-subsets: rm -fr './Inter (web latin)' && mkdir './Inter (web latin)' && rm -fr './Inter (web hinted latin)' && mkdir './Inter (web hinted latin)'
scripts.subset-unhinted: glyphhanger --subset='./temp/Inter Web/'*.woff* --LATIN --formats=woff2,woff                    && find './temp/Inter Web/' -type f -name '*subset.woff**' -exec cp {} './Inter (web latin)/' ';'                            && rename 's/-subset//' './Inter (web latin)/'*.woff*
scripts.subset-hinted: glyphhanger --subset='./temp/Inter Hinted for Windows/Web/'*.woff* --LATIN --formats=woff2,woff && find './temp/Inter Hinted for Windows/Web/' -type f -name '*subset.woff**' -exec cp {} './Inter (web hinted latin)/' ';'  && rename 's/-subset//' './Inter (web hinted latin)/'*.woff*
scripts.subset-cleanup: rm './Inter (web latin)/Inter.var.woff' && rm './Inter (web latin)/Inter-italic.var.woff' && rm './Inter (web latin)/Inter-roman.var.woff'
